query:
-- 获取股票用户ID
SET @stock_user_id = (SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1);

-- 为用户ID=1授权访问客户A
INSERT INTO stockUserPermissions (userId, stockUserId, profitPercentage, deposit, authorizationDate) 
VALUES (1, @stock_user_id, 30, '50000.00', '2024-01-01');

-- 为客户A添加每日余额数据
INSERT INTO stockBalances (stockUserId, date, balance) VALUES 
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-04', '510000.00'),
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-05', '512000.00'),
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-06', '515000.00'),
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-07', '513000.00'),
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-08', '518000.00'),
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-09', '519802.52'),
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-10', '522000.00');

SET @stock_user_id = (SELECT id FROM stockUsers WHERE name = '客户A' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1);

-- 为用户ID=1授权访问客户A
INSERT INTO stockUserPermissions (userId, stockUserId, profitPercentage, deposit, authorizationDate) 
VALUES (1, @stock_user_id, 30, '50000.00', '2024-01-01');

-- 为客户A添加每日余额数据
INSERT INTO stockBalances (stockUserId, date, balance) VALUES 
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-04', '510000.00'),
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-05', '512000.00'),
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-06', '515000.00'),
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-07', '513000.00'),
(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-08', '518000.00'),

(@stock_user_id, '2026-01-10', '522000.00');
